import {useState} from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import logo from '../../images/jimbei.png' import './Login.css' const Login = () => { const [usuario, guardarUsuario] = useState({ email : '', password : '' }) const {email, password } = usuario return (
{alert(e.target.value)}} value={email} />
); } export default Login;
